basicInfo.name: Mercure
basicInfo.flavor: When war erupted from a monster invasion, Mercure entered the war to experiment using the black magic he'd learned. He was appointed as a knight after making significant contributions in the war effort.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - Starting battles with at least 3 Magic hero(es) on your team grants a 45% chance to inflict Magic Reflux. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Magic Attack.
 - Increases Chance: Magic Reflux chance becomes 50%.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Changes Effect: Changes Magic Reflux Damage to 15% and changes the number of targets to 4.

Skill 1.name: Dark Larceny
Skill 1.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 60% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 45% chance to inflict Stun. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - All Magic Allies
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 40% of the caster's Magic Attack. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 70% of Magic Attack.
 - Increases Chance: Stun chance becomes 55%.

Skill 2.name: Forbidden Experiments
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 52% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
 - When starting battles with at least 3 Magic hero(es) on your team, each attack has a 40% chance to inflict Magic Reflux. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - 100% chance to inflict Incoming Healing Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 60% of Magic Attack.
 - Increases Chance: Magic Reflux chance becomes 50%.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Changes Effect: Changes Magic Reflux Damage to 15% and changes the number of targets to 4.

Passive.name: Depraved Mage
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Blessing. [Always Active]
 - All Enemies
 - Inflicts Effect Resist Reduction. [Always Active]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Blessing cap becomes 25% of Max HP.
超越2段階達成効果
 - 3 Enemies
 - Adds Effect: When starting battles with at least 3 Magic hero(es) on your team, using any attack 3 time(s) has a 100% chance to inflict Magic Reflux. [Duration: 1 Turn(s)]
超越6段階達成効果
 - Changes Effect: Changes Magic Reflux Damage to 15% and changes the number of targets to 4.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Himself, his master, caviar, chaos, black magic, experiments, challenges, new things
profile.dislikes: His family, milk, all attributes of order, white magic, rules, ethics
profile.story: When war erupted from a monster invasion, Mercure entered the war to experiment using the black magic he'd learned. He was appointed as a knight after making significant contributions in the war effort.

basicInfo.name: Mercure
basicInfo.flavor: After his family discovered he'd learned black magic, they exiled Mercure. He began living as a wanderer with his Master and made all black magic his own.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - Starting battles with at least 3 Magic hero(es) on your team grants a 40% chance to inflict Magic Reflux. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Dark Larceny
Skill 1.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 55% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 45% chance to inflict Stun. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - All Magic Allies
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 35% of the caster's Magic Attack. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 55% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Forbidden Experiments
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 47% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
 - When starting battles with at least 3 Magic hero(es) on your team, each attack has a 35% chance to inflict Magic Reflux. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - 100% chance to inflict Incoming Healing Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 47% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Effect: Incoming Healing Reduction to 36%.

Passive.name: Depraved Mage
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Blessing. [Always Active]
 - All Enemies
 - Inflicts Effect Resist Reduction. [Always Active]

profile.story: After his family discovered he'd learned black magic, they exiled Mercure. He began living as a wanderer with his Master and made all black magic his own.

basicInfo.name: Mercure
basicInfo.flavor: Mercure was born into a family schooled in white magic, but he was bored by white magic's strict rules. While in a slump, he encountered a black magician and secretly began training under him.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - Starting battles with at least 3 Magic hero(es) on your team grants a 40% chance to inflict Magic Reflux. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

 - Deals damage equal to 50% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 35% chance to inflict Stun. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - All Magic Allies
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 30% of the caster's Magic Attack. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 50% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Forbidden Experiments
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 42% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
 - When starting battles with at least 3 Magic hero(es) on your team, each attack has a 35% chance to inflict Magic Reflux. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - 100% chance to inflict Incoming Healing Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 42% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Effect: Incoming Healing Reduction to 28%.

Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Blessing. [Always Active]
 - All Enemies
 - Inflicts Effect Resist Reduction. [Always Active]
